frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-bifocals
frozen.shortDescription: Gnome extension adding more window management keyboard shortcuts.
frozen.longDescription:
Gnome extension adding more window management keyboard shortcuts.

* Left / right 'view split' anchoring cycles through 3 sizes: 1/3, 1/2, and 2/3 of the current screen width.
*Adds 'mid screen' of centering the window with 3/4 screen height and width.
